word: He says, "I will not leave you comfortless: I will come to you" (John 14:18). . . . Do you individually believe these words? Or do you treat them as idle tales? Do you grasp them by faith, and accept them and rejoice in them? This is eating the flesh and drinking the blood of the Son of God.--Manuscript 42, Oct. 25, 1890, "Diary."
